name: n8n-nodes-base.removeDuplicates
semantic_context: Delete items with matching field values

operation.name: operation

options.name: Remove Items Repeated Within Current Input
options.action: Remove items repeated within current input

options.name: Remove Items Processed in Previous Executions
options.description: Deduplicate items already seen in previous executions
options.action: Remove items processed in previous executions

options.name: Clear Deduplication History
options.description: Wipe the store of previous items

operation.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

compare.name: compare
compare.description: The fields of the input items to compare to see if they are the same
compare.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

fieldsToExclude.name: fieldsToExclude
fieldsToExclude.description: Fields in the input to exclude from the comparison
fieldsToExclude.ai_hint: Fields in the input to exclude from the comparison

fieldsToCompare.name: fieldsToCompare
fieldsToCompare.description: Fields in the input to add to the comparison
fieldsToCompare.ai_hint: Fields in the input to add to the comparison

logic.name: logic

options.name: Value Is New
options.description: Remove all input items with values matching those already processed

options.name: Value Is Higher than Any Previous Value
options.description: Works with incremental values, removes all input items with values up to the stored value

options.name: Value Is a Date Later than Any Previous Date
options.description: Works with date values, removes all input items with values up to the stored date

logic.description: How to select input items to remove by comparing them with key values previously processed
logic.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

dedupeValue.name: dedupeValue
dedupeValue.description: Use an input field (or a combination of fields) that has a unique ID value
dedupeValue.hint: The input field value to compare between items
dedupeValue.ai_hint: Use an input field (or a combination of fields) that has a unique ID value

incrementalDedupeValue.name: incrementalDedupeValue
incrementalDedupeValue.description: Use an input field (or a combination of fields) that has an incremental value
incrementalDedupeValue.hint: The input field value to compare between items, an incremental value is expected
incrementalDedupeValue.ai_hint: Use an input field (or a combination of fields) that has an incremental value

dateDedupeValue.name: dateDedupeValue
dateDedupeValue.description: Use an input field that has a date value in ISO format
dateDedupeValue.hint: The input field value to compare between items, a date is expected
dateDedupeValue.ai_hint: Use an input field that has a date value in ISO format

mode.name: mode
mode.description: How you want to modify the key values stored on the database. None of these modes removes input items.

options.name: Clean Database
options.description: Clear all values stored for a key in the database

mode.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

options.name: options
disableDotNotation
options.description: Whether to disallow referencing child fields using `parent.child` in the field name

options.name: removeOtherFields
options.description: Whether to remove any fields that are not being compared. If disabled, will keep the values from the first of the duplicates.

options.name: scope
options.description: If set to ‘workflow,’ key values will be shared across all nodes in the workflow. If set to ‘node,’ key values will be specific to this node.

options.name: Workflow
options.description: Deduplication info will be shared by all the nodes in the workflow

options.name: Node
options.description: Deduplication info will be stored only for this node

options.name: historySize
options.hint: The max number of past items to store for deduplication

options.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

conditional_rules: IF logic == 'removeItemsWithAlreadySeenKeyValues' AND /operation == 'removeItemsSeenInPreviousExecutions' THEN SHOW parameter 'dedupeValue'
IF logic == 'removeItemsUpToStoredIncrementalKey' AND /operation == 'removeItemsSeenInPreviousExecutions' THEN SHOW parameter 'incrementalDedupeValue'
IF logic == 'removeItemsUpToStoredDate' AND /operation == 'removeItemsSeenInPreviousExecutions' THEN SHOW parameter 'dateDedupeValue'
IF operation IN ["removeDuplicateInputItems", "removeItemsSeenInPreviousExecutions", "clearDeduplicationHistory"] THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
